ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
📜 篇幅：{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
🔖 标签：{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
🗿 肉量：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
✏  评分：{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.brief@text##小说简介：}}`;
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){ var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box"); if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) { document.select("div.line"); } else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){ result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证"; }}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){ result=java.getString("#content@img@src"); result.split('\n').map(x=>``).join('\n'); }else if(baseUrl.match(/video/)){ if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

{{$.model.title}}

⌚️ 时长：{{$.model.durationFormat}}

📆 日期：{{$.model.onlineTime##T|.000.*## }}

🎥 播放：{{$.model.viewCount}}次

📩 收藏：{{$.model.collectCount}}

🕵 片商：{{$.model.authors}}

👤 上传：{{$.model.uploader}}

🔖 标签：{{$.model.categories}},{{$.model.tags}}

🏷 简介：{{$.model.brief}}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + `{{$.model.url}}`; }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) { java.getString('{$.model.url}') }

'{{getUrl()}}novel/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	'{{getUrl()}}comic/intro?id={{$.id}}'
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
'{{getUrl()}}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id={{$.id}}&viewId='+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000)
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
'{{getUrl()}}api/audio/app/audio/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    java.toast('当前为听书模式🧾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

searchUrl:
<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0){
'{{getUrl()}}'+
'api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword={{key}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
}else if (x == 1) {
	'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
	}else if (x == 2 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/video/app/video/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
		}else if (x == 3 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=42'
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl['match'](/mv/)) { p = result['match'](/data\-url\=\"(.*)\"\s/); p = p ? p[0x1] : 0x1; jy=`{{getUrl()}}` let name = java['getString']('h1@text'); img=`{{@@#mse@data-poster}}` rq=`{{@@.mt-2@span.4@text}}` xh=`{{@@.mt-2@span.6@text}}` bf=`{{@@.mt-2@span.5@text}}` let intro = java['getString']('.mt-2!0@span.1@text'); let kind = java['getString']('.underline@text'); java.log(img) if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

${name}

📆 日期：${rq}

🎥 播放：${bf}次

📩 收藏：${xh}

🔖 标签：${kind}

🏷 简介：${intro}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + p; } else { java['getString']('main@html'); }

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0) {
    java.getElements('.items-start');
}else if(x==1){
    java.getElements('.dx-novel-list@li@a');
}
else if(x==2){
    java.getElements('.dx-video-list@li');
}</js>
ruleSearch.name:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0) {
  java.getString(".dx-title@textNodes");
} else if (x== 2){
java.getString(".text-default@text");
} else if(x==1){
   java.getString(".truncate.0@text");
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
java.getElements('.toggleVolume,ul@.cursor-pointer');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/mv/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	   book.type = 64;
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}
</js>

searchUrl:

v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
 if(x==0){
'{{getUrl()}}'+'novel/all?key_word={{key}}<,&page={{page}}>'
}else if(x==1){
'{{getUrl()}}'+'comic/all?key_word={{key}}<,&page={{page}}>'
}if(x==2){
'{{getUrl()}}'+'mv/all?key_word={{key}}<,&page={{page}}>'
}
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
push=(title,url,type1,type2)=>sort.push({
		title: title,

				layout_flexGrow: type1,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
			}
	});
push("🔖小说专区🔖",null,1,1)

push("原创首发",`{{getUrl()}}novel/common?type=original<,&page={{page+1}}>`,1,0.39)
	arList=["都市激情","校园春色","乡村爱情","系统异能","家庭乱伦","穿越重生","经典武侠","同人改编","科学幻想","东方玄幻","娱乐明星","历史架空","西方魔幻","贤者小说"]
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{

`;

`,1,1)

	push('收藏',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=collect_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,0.25)

	push('观看量',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=view_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,0.25)
	prList=["日本漫画"]
	orList=["短篇","单本","同人"]
		prList.map((teg,ure)=>{

	orList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=${index}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
		});

		 mrList=["韩国H漫"]
	arList=["剧情","校园","爱情","BL","奇幻","调教","乱伦"]
	mrList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=${index+1}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page=1&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
				});
				push("🔖视频专区🔖",null,1,1)
				push('全部🌊视频',`{{getUrl()}}mv/all?page={{page}}`,1,1)
				push('热门🌊视频',`{{getUrl()}}mv/hot?page={{page}}`,1,0.35)
push('最近🌊更新',`{{getUrl()}}mv/new`,1,0.35)
     push('排行榜',`{{getUrl()}}mv/rank`,1,1)
			krList=[["国产视频","1",0],["日本AV","2",0],["H动漫","3",0],["偷拍自拍","1",1],["次元萝莉","1",2],["国产传媒","1",3],["主播福利","1",4],["吃瓜爆料","1",5],["无码流出","2",1],["高清AV","2",2],["同人热播","3",1],["3D动漫","3",2]]
				krList.map(([teg,ure,o])=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}mv/all?keyword=&title=&actor=0&merchant=&category=${ure}&category_sub=${o}&page_num=1&tag=0&sort_field=id&sort_order=1&limit=48&page={{page}}`,1,0.25)
})

JSON.stringify(sort)

bookSourceComment:
v1.0添加了登录功能
v1.1更改了分类标签相关规则
v1.2添加了注册功能，优化了代码可读性（不清楚，也许只有我能看懂这坨）
v1.3修复图片不加载的问题
v1.4做了一点点优化
v1.5做了一点点优化
v1.6更改了正文获取方式，删除登录功能，改用网页登录
v1.7优化发现页
v1.8改了下ua，如果无法加载正文，尝试将登录url改成正文网址并通过一下cf验证
v1.9由于详情页api失效并且技术有限抓不到新的，因此修改详情页获取方式，由于某些原因，正文需要使用特定字体，最下方下载一个适合自己的字体，推荐otf格式
v1.91修了下详情页封面获取
v2.0尝试使用json字典替换正文，现在可以不需要特定字体，特别感谢xubai提供的字典
v2.1将并发率设置成3.3秒，优化详情页
v2.2，uaa取消了正文的字体防盗，所以删除相关功能
v2.3 目录api紧接着失效，改用网页
v2.4 修复目录会多出几章假章节的bug
v2.5 修复正文出现奇怪数字的问题，添加书籍URL正则，可以直接用URL添加书籍，以及其他小优化（其实是只记得有改了其他但是具体什么忘了）
v2.6优化发现页
v2.7添加了正则去除正文页尾的uaa发布地址
v2.8当触发防盗时正文直接返回空并用弹窗提示，解决缓存时触发了防盗但是不知道的问题
v2.9更新正则表达式，去除正文页尾多余的东西（最近多出来个"VIP会员免广告"影响观感）
*需要登录！否则大部分书籍无法观看全部！*
	
by@咔咔龙@kakadragonn@zhongerxll

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort = [];
nowCode = "{{Math.floor(Date.now()/1000)}\}"
push = (title, url, type1, type2) => sort.push({
	title: title,
	url: url,
	style: {
		layout_flexGrow: type1,
		layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
	}
});
push("全部🌊分类", null, 1, 1)
arList = ["校园春色", "东方玄幻", "乡村爱情", "都市激情", "家庭乱伦", "娱乐明星", "历史架空", "经典武侠", "系统异能", "穿越重生", "科学幻想", "同人改编", "强奸轮奸", "西方魔幻", "贤者小说", "堕落", "反差", "凌辱", "纯爱", "百合", "重口", "伪娘", "性奴", "萝莉", "禁忌", "熟女", "NTR", "媚黑", "绿帽", "调教", "正太", "女主", "反转", "下克上", "羞耻", "其他", "校园", "玄幻", "乡村", "乱伦", "都市", "历史", "武侠", "系统", "穿越", "科幻", "同人", "强奸", "奇幻", "贤者", "明星"]
arList.map((tag, index) => {
	url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=addtime&pay=0&finish=0&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
	push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
});
nrList = ["🔖全部🔖", "🔖玄幻🔖", "🔖奇幻🔖", "武侠", "🔖仙侠🔖", "🔖都市🔖", "🔖言情🔖", "🔖历史🔖", "🔖军事🔖", "🔖游戏🔖", "🔖悬疑🔖", "🔖科幻🔖", "灵异🔖", "二次元🔖", "🔖短篇🔖"]
mrList = ["全部", "连载中", "完结"]
prList = ['全部', '30万字', '30-50万', '50-100万', '100-200万', '200万']
orList = ["全部", "免费", "付费", "VIP"]
nrList.map((tag, index) => {
	url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=0&finish=0&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
	push(tag, url, 1, 1);
	mrList.map((teg, uei) => {
		url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=0&finish=${uei}&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
		push(teg, url, 1, 0.25);
	});
	prList.map((tog, uri) => {
		mrList.map((teg, uei) => {
			url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=0&finish=${uei}&tags=0&size=${uri}&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
			push(tog, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
	});
	orList.map((trg, ure) => {
		mrList.map((teg, uei) => {
			url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=${ure}&finish=${uei}&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
			push(trg, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
	});
});
//java.log(JSON.stringify(sort))
JSON.stringify(sort)
</js>

bookSourceComment:
// Error: 搜索失效

/*
version: 2025.0205
完善发现,添加搜索接口by河鹅和
优化搜索发现
目录乱序修复by折木
目录乱序修复可通过设置书籍变量来开启，默认关闭
发现添加最新入库，需要先登录构造本地数据
添加本地搜索，可通过构造的本地数据进行搜索，在搜索关键词前加上name:,id:,author:,tags:即可指定搜索类型，默认为搜索书名，例子：author:佚名
当前支持类型有author,category,id,intro,name,pornrate,score,status,tags,update,word,all，分别是搜索作者,分类,书ID,简介,书名,肉量,评分,状态,标签,更新,字数,全部
发现自动添加书籍到本地数据
本地搜索支持正则，例：id:^95[5-9]\d$、all:(白天|黑夜)
添加更多排序选择
添加设置每次并发数
2025.01.31 修改本地数据保存方法，不再保存到源变量
02.01 优化目录乱序修复
02.04 优化本地数据保存，将数据切分每50万个字符保存，数据网络导出最大为10M，超过10M请使用本地导出
02.05 优化生成发现方法
*/
api = [
`https://www.aaccnn.com/e/search/,{
  "body": "keyboard=${key}",
  "method": "POST"
}`,
`https://www.aahhss.com/e/search/,{
  "body": "keyboard=${key}",
  "method": "POST"
}`,
`https://www.aakkrr.com/book/${key}<,/${page}>`,
toDataUrl(key,page-1)]
v = String(checkData()['api'])
result = api[v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:2]
header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.0.0; MI 5s Plus Build/OPR1.170623.032; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/71.0.3578.99 Mobile Safari/537.36"}

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
booklist=[]
$=checkData()
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key,page,sortType]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word):/.test(key)){
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
		}else{
			[key,page]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
			type="name"
			}
			books=$.books
	for (let i in books){
    books[i]["id"]=i
    booklist.push(books[i])
    }
    Regkey=createRegExp(key)
    booklist=booklist.filter(b=>String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
  
  if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType){
  st=sortType||$.sortType
  booklist.sort((a,b)=>getSortValue(a,st)-getSortValue(b,st))
  	}
  if(!$.order){
  	booklist.reverse()
  	}
  if (booklist.length>0&&page==0)java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍`)
  else if((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0)java.toast("\n⚠️请先登录构造本地数据")
  booklist=getl(booklist,page);
	}else {
		result=java.getElements(".book-like a")
		count=0
		result.forEach(r=>{
			id=java.getString("href",r).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
			temp={name:java.getString('h4@text',r),author:java.getString("span@text",r),cover:String(java.getString("img@src",r)).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,"")}
			if (!(id in $.books)){
				$.books[id]=Object.assign({},temp)
				count++
				}
			temp.id=id
			booklist.push(temp)
			})
		if (count>0){
			java.toast(`\n✅本地数据新增${count}本`)
			setv($)
			}
		}
JSON.stringify(booklist)
</js>
$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: {{baseUrl.match(/\/e\//)?java.getString('span@text'):""}}{{$.author||""}}
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.log(baseUrl)
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key, page, sortType] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
	if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word|all)[:]/.test(key)) {
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
	} else {
		[key, page] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
		type="name"
	}
	$=checkData()
	books=$.books
	booklist=[]
	for (let i in books) {
		books[i]["id"]=i
		type == "all" ? Object.defineProperty(books[i], 'all', {
			get: function(){
				return JSON.stringify(this)
			}
		}) : ""
		booklist.push(books[i])
	}
	Regkey=createRegExp(key)
	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {
		st = sortType || $.sortType
		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()
 	}
 	if (booklist.length>0&&page==0) java.toast(`\n✅成功获取${booklist.length}本书籍\n当前为按${$.sortType=="pornrate"?"肉量":($.sortType=="score"?"评分":($.sortType=="word"?"字数":($.sortType=="update"?"更新":"ID")))}${$.order?"⬆️正":"⬇️倒"}序排列`)
 	else if ((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0) java.toast("\n❎本地数据未找到，请切换搜索接口")
 	booklist=getl(booklist,page);
 	java.setContent(JSON.stringify(booklist))
 	result=java.getElements("$[*]")
}else result=java.getElements(".book-like a||.grid-item")
</js>
ruleSearch.name: {{@h4@text||h3@text||""}}{{$.name||""}}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
try{
	v = checkData()
	id=String(e.select('[property="og:novel:read_url"]').attr("content")).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
	v.books[id]={author:e.select('[property="og:novel:author"]').attr("content"),category:Object.values(e.select(".categories a").textNodes()),cover:String(e.select('[property="og:image"]').attr("content")).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,""),intro:e.select('.book-desc').textNodes().toArray().join(""),name:e.select('[property="og:novel:book_name"]').attr("content"),pornrate:e.select('.pornrate dd').text(),score:Number(e.select('.score dd').text()),status:e.select('[property="og:novel:status"]').attr("content"),tags:Object.values(e.select('.tag a').textNodes()),update:String(e.select('.new dd').textNodes()[0]).trim(),word:e.select(".wordcount dd").text()}
	setv(v)
} catch(error) {
	java.log(error)
}
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let chapterNumber = 0;
if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\n✅目录乱序修复已开启")
	   chapters.forEach((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/第(\d+)(-\d+)?章/);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: item.attr("href")
        });
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = chapters
}
chapterData
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[2]
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`

try {
    const response = java.ajax(`{{getUrl()}}api/novel/app/novel/comments?novelId=@get:{bid}&sortType=1&page=${x}&rows=5`);
    const jsonData = JSON.parse(response);
    const logOutput = jsonData.data.map(comment => {
        const cleanNickName = comment.updateTime.replace(/T/g,'  ').replace(/\..*/g, '');
        // 根据分数生成星星显示
        const generateStars = (score) => {
            let starCount = Math.min(Math.floor(score / 2), 5);
            let stars = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                stars += i < starCount? '★' : '☆';
            }
            return stars;
        };
        const starDisplay = generateStars(comment.score);
        return `
  [${cleanNickName}]  ${comment.createTimeFormat}
⛄【${comment.nickName}】:👍🏻${comment.score} ${starDisplay}
 ${comment.content}
 \n­
 
`;
    }).join('\n');
    //java.log(logOutput);

<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
 book.type = 8;
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'游客✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,'').replace(/注册会员/g,'VIP💎'),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'游客✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,'').replace(/注册会员/g,'VIP💎'),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;

    book.type = 8;
    //java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({

 data

 data.push({

 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
let url = `${getUrl()}`;
let uri=`data:;base64,辞晨,{"type":""}`;
try {
	if (x == 0){
	url +=	`api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword=${key}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}else if (x == 1) {
url +=	`api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
     }else if (x == 2 ) {
url +=	`api/video/app/video/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	   	}else if (x == 3 ) {
url +=	`api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword=${encodeURI(key)}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=42`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
}
let code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());

		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
sleep(600-tim);
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
let base64 = java.base64Encode(baseUrl);
let result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":"url"}`;
java.put('url',result)
let url = java.base64Decode(base64);
java.ajax(url);}else{
url=java.hexDecodeToString(result);
url=String(url).replace(/^\//,'');
java.ajax(`${getUrl()}${url}`)
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
 intro=`
 	 
 📖 书名：{{@@h1@text}}
 👤 作者：{{@@p.0@a.0@text}}
 🔖 标签：{{@@p.3@a[href~=tag]@text##\s##,}}
 🕰 最新：{{@@p.0@a.1@text}}
 {{@@.tLJ@text}}
 🏷 简介：{{@@class.intro@text##htt.+l}}
 `;
 let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】\n';
  
 try {
     let p = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select('input[name=novel_id]').attr('value');
     let pi = `{{getUrl()}}index.php?s=/Home/comment/lists/id/${p}/type/novel/limit/5/size/12`;
     let po = String(java.ajax(pi)).match(/trre\=([\s\S]+),page_num/)[1] || 1;
     var datas = JSON.parse(po);
  
     // 获取当前用户UID（从登录cookie中提取）
     let myuid = null;
     if (source.getLoginHeader()) {
         try {
             let jc = source.getLoginHeaderMap();
             let inf = decodeURIComponent(jc.get("Cookie"));
             let info = decodeURIComponent(inf).match(/\{[\s\S]+\}/)?.[0];
             if (info) myuid = JSON.parse(info)['uid'];
         } catch(e) { java.log('用户信息解析失败') }
     }
  
     // 时间格式化函数 
     function formatTime(timestamp) {
         return new Date(timestamp * 1000).toLocaleString();
     }
  
     // 处理我的评论数据
     var myComments = [];
     function collectMyComments(comment, parentPath) {
         let floor = parentPath ? `${parentPath}-${comment.floorIndex}` : comment.floorIndex;
         if (myuid && comment.uid === Number(myuid)) {
             myComments.push({
                 id: comment.id,
                 username: comment.user?.username || "已注销用户",
                 group: comment.user?.group || "",
                 floor: `【${floor}楼】`,
                 time: formatTime(comment.create_time),
                 content: comment.content
             });
         }
         if (comment._?.forEach) {
             comment._.forEach((child, index) => {
                 child.floorIndex = index + 1;
                 collectMyComments(child, floor);
             });
         }
     }
  
     // 处理全部评论数据 
     function buildComments(comment, parentPath, level = 0) {
         let floor = parentPath ? `${parentPath}-${comment.floorIndex}` : comment.floorIndex;
         let indent = '  '.repeat(level);
         let str = `${indent}⏱️${formatTime(comment.create_time)}\n` +
 
 `${indent}👤${comment.user?.username || "已注销用户"} | ${comment.user?.group || ""}\n` +
                   `${indent}💬 ${comment.content}\n` +
                   `${indent}📍 ${floor}楼\n\n`;
  
         if (comment._?.forEach) {
             comment._.forEach((child, index) => {
                 child.floorIndex = index + 1;
                 str += buildComments(child, floor, level + 1);
             });
         }
         return str;
     }
  
     // 执行处理 
     datas.forEach((c, i) => {
         c.floorIndex = i + 1;
         collectMyComments(c, "");
     });
  
     // 构建输出
     var output = intro + pl;
     if (myComments.length > 0) {
         output += "=== 我的评论（共" + myComments.length + "条） ===\n\n";
         myComments.forEach(m => {
             output += `⏱️${m.time}\n👤${m.username} | ${m.group}\n💬 ${m.content}\n📍 ${m.floor}\n\n`;
         });
     }
  
     output += "=== 全部评论（共" + datas.length + "条） ===\n\n";
     datas.forEach((c, i) => {
         c.floorIndex = i + 1;
         output += buildComments(c, "");
     });
  
     result = output;
 } catch (e) {
     java.log('评论加载错误：' + e);
     result = intro + pl + "本书暂时没有评论或加载失败";
 }
 </js>

<js>
let murl=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).replace(/.*.com/g,'');
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'');
//java.log(url)
let src=java.ajax(`${url}${murl}`);
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("验证Cookie：" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

//处理重新获取文本时可能会出现的错误。
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`未获取到文本，正在重试...（当前第${retryCount}次重试）`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "重试三次仍然未获取到文本，请检查网络状况。"
}
result;

if(key.includes("z：")){
	keys=String(key).replace(/z：/g,"");
	url += `search.html?q=${encodeURI(keys)}&f=tag&sort=relevance&p=${page}&serialize=`;
		}else{
	url+=`search.html?q=${encodeURI(key)}&f=_all&sort=relevance&p=${page}&serialize=`;
 }
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
code = ss.statusCode();
if (code == 302) {
	ss.header("location");
	}else if (code == 200) {
 cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
		}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>

1.由于网站有验证机制，请将更多设置里的预下载设置为0，不要一次性缓存过多章节
2.需要登录，否则加载不了目录
3.网站如果被墙了，可以自行更换其它可用域名
常见问题解决办法：
1.刷新界面，登录验证
2.换网络换流量换vpn节点
3.清除缓存清除cookie清除web数据

var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
let catalog = document.select("ul.catalog_ul");
let atag = catalog.select("a").get(0);
let url0 = book.origin + atag.attr("href");
let html0 = java.ajax(url0);
let document0 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html0);
document0.select("li.child, li.menu, div.volume_title_box");
</js>

{{@@.last9.0@ul@li.0@a.0@text}}•{{@@.bq span.0@text##更新：|\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleSearch.name: td.0@text
